data.title: Rankings, Tuition, GMAT, ROI
data.meta_description: Before applying to the Whitworth University MBA program, read our annual 2024 guide to uncover the best ranked and most affordable MBAs.
data.text:
The Whitworth University School of Business offers a comprehensive MBA program that is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in a rapidly changing global business environment. Located in Spokane, Washington, Whitworth’s MBA program emphasizes ethical leadership, critical thinking, and practical application. The program’s flexible scheduling, experienced faculty, and strong emphasis on experiential learning make it one of the best options for aspiring business professionals in the region.

Key Student Benefits

1. Flexible Scheduling

Whitworth’s MBA program offers evening seminar-style courses, allowing students to choose between full-time and part-time study. Full-time students can complete the program in as little as nine months, while part-time students can finish in 22 months. This flexibility ensures that students can balance their studies with their professional and personal commitments.

2. Experiential Learning

The program emphasizes practical application through internships, special projects, and business plan development. Students gain hands-on experience that enhances their understanding of business concepts and prepares them for real-world challenges.

3. Ethical Leadership

Rooted in Christian principles, Whitworth’s MBA program emphasizes ethical decision-making and social responsibility. Students are taught to consider the broader impact of business decisions on society and the environment, preparing them to be conscientious leaders.

4. Experienced Faculty

Whitworth’s faculty are active in the fields of business and management studies, bringing practical business and cross-cultural experience to the classroom. They engage in research and consulting for governments and corporations, providing students with current and relevant insights.

5. Global Business Perspective

The program provides comprehensive training in global business management, helping students develop intercultural intelligence and expand their knowledge of world markets. This global perspective is essential for success in today’s interconnected business environment.

MBA Concentrations Offered by the School

Whitworth University offers several MBA concentrations that allow students to tailor their education to their career goals. These concentrations include:

Executive Leadership

Innovation & Change Management

Strategic Management

Financial Planning

Comprehensive Leadership

Executive Leadership

The Executive Leadership concentration focuses on developing advanced leadership skills. Courses cover topics such as executive leadership, transferable team performance, and design thinking. This concentration includes a three-day outdoor excursion, providing a unique experiential learning opportunity. Learn more about the Executive Leadership concentration.

Innovation & Change Management

The Innovation & Change Management concentration prepares students to lead and manage change within organizations. Courses include risk management, change management, and design thinking. This concentration is ideal for those looking to drive innovation and manage organizational change effectively. Learn more about the Innovation & Change Management concentration.

Strategic Management

The Strategic Management concentration focuses on developing strategic thinking and planning skills. Courses cover strategic management, risk management, and change management. This concentration prepares students for leadership roles that require strategic decision-making and long-term planning. Learn more about the Strategic Management concentration.

Financial Planning

The Financial Planning concentration provides students with advanced skills in wealth management and financial planning. Courses include wealth management I and II, and a financial planning elective. This concentration is ideal for those looking to pursue careers in financial planning and wealth management. Learn more about the Financial Planning concentration.

Comprehensive Leadership

The Comprehensive Leadership concentration, offered through Whitworth’s Institute of Leadership, focuses on developing a broad range of leadership skills. Courses cover dynamics of self-analysis and actualization, human capital and group culture, and organizational effectiveness. This concentration is perfect for those looking to enhance their leadership capabilities across various domains. Learn more about the Comprehensive Leadership concentration.

The Whitworth University School of Business offers a robust and flexible MBA program that prepares students for leadership roles in various industries. With its strong emphasis on ethical leadership, experiential learning, and global business perspectives, the Whitworth MBA program is an excellent choice for students looking to advance their careers and make a significant impact in the business world.

Whitworth University Whitworth University School of Business Summary

In-state tuition and fees for the MBA program at Whitworth University School of Business is $34,560. Of all MBA programs offered in Washington, the average cost for in-state tuition and fees is $48,319 a year. The average cost for in-state tuition and fees for an online MBA program is $38,871 a year.

The average GMAT score to enter into Whitworth University School of Business is 670 while the average GMAT score to for MBA schools in Washington is 560.82, and the average GMAT score to enter into an online GMAT program is 550.33.

After graduating, the school reports that the average graduate salary is $64,050.

Comparing in-state tuition to the average graduate salary, you can expect an ROI on your MBA education to be in the range of 93%

The average in-state tuition you can expect to pay is about $34,560, and the average GMAT score for acceptance in their program is 670.

After graduating, the school reports that the average graduate salary is $64,050. Comparing in-state tuition to the average graduate salary, you can expect an ROI on your MBA education to be in the range of 93%

Programs are offered as: Campus, Full-Time and Online.

The school is ranked by: Whitworth University's MBA program is accredited by the AACSB and is ranked by the following publications: MBAGuide.org
